net.padlocksoftware.padlock.license
Class LicenseSigner

java.lang.Object
  net.padlocksoftware.padlock.license.LicenseSigner

public final class LicenseSigner
extends java.lang.Object

Public factory class for signing Licenses. The LicenseSigner is aware of whether the Padlock library is running with a valid license, and if not, it will automatically add (or override as required) the expiration date of the license to be signed. To determine this, the LicenseSigner looks in the same folder as the Padlock jar file for a file named "Padlock.lic" and attempts to validate itself using that.

Author:
Jason Nichols (jason@padlocksoftware.net)

Method Detail

createLicenseSigner

public static LicenseSigner createLicenseSigner(java.security.interfaces.DSAPrivateKey privateKey)
Create a new LicenseSigner object. This instance can sign any number of licenses using a single PrivateKey. This method assumes that the Padlock license file resides in the same folder as the Padlock jar file.

Parameters:
privateKey - The DSA (Padlock 2.x) Private Key to sign the License objects with.
Returns:
A new LicenseSigner instance.

createLicenseSigner

public static LicenseSigner createLicenseSigner(java.security.interfaces.DSAPrivateKey privateKey,
                                                License padlockLicense)
Create a new LicenseSigner object. This instance can sign any number of licenses using a single PrivateKey.

Parameters:
privateKey - The DSA (Padlock 2.x) Private Key to sign the License objects with.
padlockLicense - The instance of the Padlock License, purchased from Padlock Software LLC.
Returns:
A new LicenseSigner instance.
Since:
2.0.2

createLicenseSigner

public static LicenseSigner createLicenseSigner(java.security.interfaces.DSAPrivateKey privateKey,
                                                java.io.File padlockLicenseFile)
                                         throws java.io.IOException
Create a new LicenseSigner object. This instance can sign any number of licenses using a single PrivateKey.

Parameters:
privateKey - The DSA (Padlock 2.x) Private Key to sign the License objects with.
padlockLicenseFile - The instance of the Padlock License file, purchased from Padlock Software LLC.
Returns:
A new LicenseSigner instance.
Throws:
java.io.IOException - If any file related errors occur.
ImportException - If the license is malformed or missing required data.
Since:
2.0.2

sign

public void sign(License license)
Sign the supplied license using the PrivateKey given at the LicenseSigner instantation.

Parameters:
license - The license to sign. Once signed, a license cannot be modified.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalStateException - If the license has already been signed.
